events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event emitted for setting the modelValue

props.name: collapseOnItemClick
props.description: Determines if the navbar should close when clicking a navbar item

props.name: collapseOnClickOutside
props.description: Determines if the navbar should close when clicking outside

props.name: color
props.description: The color variant of the navbar

props.name: fluid
props.description: Display the inner container as fluid, spanning 100% width

props.name: size
props.description: The size variant of the navbar

props.name: menuAnimation
props.description: The animation of the hamburger menu component used for collapsing

styles.name: brand-margin
styles.description: The margin of the navbar component brand

styles.name: border-radius
styles.description: The border radius of the navbar component

styles.description: The font size of the navbar component

styles.name: padding
styles.description: The padding of the navbar component
